TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p ɹ iː s k ɔːɹ s t ɛ n d ə æ s k ɚ t ʊ p ɹ iː n ð iː z s ɪ z w ɪ z x ɜː f ɹ ʌ m ɹ ə s t ɔːɹ s ɪ k s s b uː ŋ z ʌ f ɹ ɛ ʃ s l oʊ p z f æ v s ɪ ŋ s l æ f s ʌ b l uː tʃ iː z æ n d ɐ m eɪ b i ɐ s n æ k f ɔːɹ ɹ ə b ɹ æ ɹ ɐ b ɔː w iː v ɔː s oʊ n iː d ɐ s m ɔː l p l æ s t ɪ k s n eɪ k æ n d ɐ b ɪ ɡ t ɔːɹ f ɹ oʊ k f ɔːɹ ɹ ɐ k eɪ s ʃ iː h æ z k uː p t ð iː z s ɪ ŋ z ɪ n t ʊ θ ɹ iː ɹ aɪ b æ k s æ n d w iː v ɜː ɡ oʊ m iː ɾ ᵻ əl w ɛ n z d eɪ d ə t ɹ iː n s t eɪ ʃ ə n
